exclusion: When the pushbutton is released after a press of (2sec<T<20sec) the device will send a NIF to include the device to the Z-Wave network. Main LED will blink with 0,3 sec period.
inclusion: When the pushbutton is released after a press of (2sec<T<20sec) the device will send a NIF to include the device to the Z-Wave network. Main LED will blink with 0,3 sec period.
overview: This product is standard, having dimensions of 85.5x83.5mm. Its type of emborning is by cut and can be installed both vertically and horizontally. It should be noted that the voltage capacity of this front kit for 1 element with 1 Simon iO switch will be 250V. This product of the Simon 100 series features activation using a push-button. The interval for the temperature of its proper operation will be from 5º C to 40º C and its storage temperature range is from -25º C to 50° C. For proper maintenance it is suggested to dampen a soft cloth slightly in soapy water, thus avoiding the use of abrasive cleaners that contain chlorine and may compromise the surface of the cloth.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Set time
parameters.overview:
0x00 Instantly (default value) Disable timming

0x01-0x7F 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution

0x80-0xFE 1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution

parameters.label: Fade time
parameters.overview:
0x00 Instantly (default value) Disable timming

0x01-0x7F 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution

0x80-0xFE 1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution

parameters.label: Minimum dimming value
parameters.overview: Stablishes the Max and Min percentages that can be reached. Once the devices gets a value through Z-Wave it Scales the value read according this Min and Max margins.

parameters.label: Maximum dimming value
parameters.overview: Stablishes the Max and Min percentages that can be reached. Once the devices gets a value through Z-Wave it Scales the value read according this Min and Max margins.

parameters.label: Last on value
parameters.overview: Returns or sets the last non zero dimming value. In case of Set the device turns ON the load.

options.label: Device is calibrated using Trailing Edge
Device is calibrated using Leading Edge

parameters.label: Delay ON
parameters.overview:
0x00 Instantly (default value) Disable timming

0x01-0x7F 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution

0x80-0xFE 1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution

parameters.label: Activation time
parameters.overview:
0x00 Instantly (default value) Disable timming

0x01-0x7F 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution

0x80-0xFE 1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution

options.label: Central LED on at 20% of maximum level
Unlock the direct control of load
Lock the direct control of load

parameters.label: Delay OFF
parameters.overview:
0x00 Instantly (default value) Disable timming

0x01-0x7F 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution

0x80-0xFE 1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution

options.label: Device turns the load ON and then OFF
Device toggles the load and dims

parameters.label: Identify
parameters.overview: The central LED blinks for 5 seconds in order to identify the device.

parameters.label: State of charge
parameters.overview:
First byte

0x00 Load is OFF

0x01 Load is ON

Second byte 0x00 - 0x063 Last active dimming value

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.overview:
On/Off Report when load state is changed:

On -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x01 - 0x63 Report the dimming level

Off -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00

Instant Power Consumption vary over 10% and is stable almost 2sec:

CC Meter, Meter Report, “Electric meter”, “Consumed”, “Watts”, Size 4, Precision 1, Value (W)

Calibration requirement change. (If device needs to be calibrated and is Added into a Z-Wave network, it will report after receive an Association Set of life line).

Calibration required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0xFF

Calibration not required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0x00

After reset the Z-Wave module, a DEVICE-RESET-LOCALLY-NOTIFICATION is sent.

associations.label: CTRL
associations.overview:
On/Off Report when load state is changed:

On -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x01 - 0x63 Report the dimming level

Off -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00
